## Variables

var (
    ErrFileClosed        = errors.New("File is closed")
    ErrOutOfRange        = errors.New("out of range")
    ErrTooLarge          = errors.New("too large")
    ErrFileNotFound      = os.ErrNotExist
    ErrFileExists        = os.ErrExist
    ErrDestinationExists = os.ErrExist
)
